content.rendered:
Spa for your style fitness

see more

Get 20% off your first visit !

Experience luxurious pampering with 20% off your first visit at Golden Spa Saloon. Enjoy the best in beauty and wellness with us today!

Make an Appointment

Felix spa & wellness

Welcome to Golden Spa & WellnessAt Golden Spa & Wellness, we understand that your physical, mental and emotional wellbeing is of the utmost importance. That’s why we offer the best spa treatments in town that are tailored to meet your specific needs. From therapeutic massages to body wraps, you can trust us to provide the best spa experience possible.

Golden Spa & Wellness offers you a chance to escape from everyday stress with our luxurious amenities. Our facility is equipped with all of the latest amenities such as private steam rooms, saunas, Jacuzzis and more so that you can truly relax in style.

Location

Moosapet, Near Metro station, Pillar no 900, Hyderabad, Telangana 500018

Opening time

Mon – Sun: 10:30 AM – 8:30 PM

Phone number

+91 7993877555

Email address

info@goldenspasaloon.com

 

Our services

Experience the relaxed and luxurious atmosphere of Golden Spa Salon and enjoy our best services, from hair to skin care and makeovers.

Neck massage

Relax and unwind with Golden Spa Saloon’s neck massage. Professional services to help you de-stress and feel your best.

Aromatherapy massage

At Golden Spa Salon, let us transport you to a blissful escape with our Aromatherapy Massage. Enjoy the perfect relaxation experience.

Foot massage

Unwind with an incredible foot massage from Golden Spa Salon. The perfect way to relax and rejuvenate your mind and body. Book today.

Facial spa

Relax and rejuvenate with Golden Spa Saloon’s Facial Spa services. Our experts will provide you with the care you need for your skin to look its best.

see more

Beautiful skin starts here.

Watch our video

Testimonials

Relax and rejuvenate at Golden Spa Saloon. Read inspiring testimonials from our satisfied customers and see why we're the best spa around!
CUSTOMERS
Click here

Contact Us

Discover the ultimate relaxation at the Golden Spa Saloon. Contact us now to book an appointment and experience the benefits of our professional spa services.
